## **Introduction**


*masscleaner* is a R package which is used to process and analyze metabolomics data.


Please install it via [github](https://github.com/tidymass/masscleaner).

```{r,eval=FALSE,warning=FALSE, message=FALSE,R.options="", cache=TRUE}
if(!require(devtools)){
  install.packages("devtools")
}
devtools::install_github("tidymass/masscleaner")
```

We use the demo data in `demoData` package to show how to use `masscleaner`. Please install it first.

```{r,eval=FALSE,warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, R.options=""}
devtools::install_github("tidymass/demoData")
```

***

## **Usage**

Please see the [Get started](https://tidymass.github.io/masscleaner/articles/masscleaner_instruction.html) page to get the instruction of `masscleaner`.
